name: Laser Knight and the Winter Tower
name_original: Laser Knight and the Winter Tower
description:
Melt your path forward while avoiding enemies in the action puzzler Laser Knight! Be careful though, ice isn't the only thing your laser shooting plasma ball melts! Time only moves when you do, take your time and carefully plan your route to each exit.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to navigate Sir Knightington.
F4 will switch between windowed and fullscreen.

Made for the GMTKJam 2021

Thanks for playing!
-Rosden, Dan, and Zanilis

P.S. if you make it to the "You Win" screen try pressing "B" ;)
